title: ISAs  AND ESAs
content:
Do all the questions in isa and esas come from slide and the textbooks in first year   
and does constitution of india cyber law and proffessional ethics also contribute to our gpa ?

comments.body: If a course has credits, it contributes to your GPA. Check the FAQs for more details on how GPA is calculated

Apart from slides and notes there are questions from lab component too.
And yeah all the courses which have credits allocated to them fetches you grades which contributes to your gpa.
